entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 early this afternoon. High 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022
